name: GNU libmicrohttpd
short_description: GNU libmicrohttpd is a small C library that is supposed to make it easy to run an HTTP server as part of another application. GNU GNU Libmicrohttpd is free software and part of the GNU project.
summary: small C library for embedding an HTTP(S) server
